Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Charles Hanrahan
Dear Sir,
Charles Hanrahan isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .224, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
